item.description:
Come tour three scale railroads of national prominence featuring N, HO, HOn3, O, and O Trolley models. You will see state-of-the-art modeling of friendly neighborhoods, beautiful landscapes, and, of course, railroads. The expanse and detail of these models continues to intrigue comers of all ages, year after year.

These are true model railroads, not just toy trains. Our Museum, our models, and our modelers have been published in international print and video media and have won numerous awards.

This is a terrific event for children and adults alike and provides an opportunity for the whole family to get out and have a great time together.
Dates/Times March 2 & 3, 2013
Saturday & Sunday
Hours: 11am to 4pm both days
Admission Adults: $5.00
Children (ages 5 to 12): $3.00
Children (Under 5): FREE
Location BSMRM
760 South Street
Roslindale, MA 02131
item.name: Bay State Model Railroad Museum Open House (kid friendly)
